Group a flowSet or GatingSet by experiment variables

Source: R/cyto-helpers.R
cyto_group_by.Rd

Group a flowSet or GatingSet by experiment variables

cyto_group_by(x, group_by = "all")

Arguments

x

an object of class flowSet or GatingSet.
group_by

names of cyto_details variables to use for merging. Set to "all" to merge all samples in x.

Value

a named list of flowSet or GatingSet objects respectively.

Examples


# Load in CytoExploreRData to access data
library(CytoExploreRData)

# Group flowSet by Treatment
cyto_group_by(Activation, "Treatment")
#> $`Stim-A`
#> A flowSet with 8 experiments.
#> 
#>   column names:
#>   FSC-A FSC-H FSC-W SSC-A SSC-H SSC-W Alexa Fluor 488-A PE-A PE-Texas Red-A 7-AAD-A PE-Cy7-A Alexa Fluor 405-A Alexa Fluor 430-A Qdot 605-A Alexa Fluor 647-A Alexa Fluor 700-A APC-Cy7-A Time
#> 
#> $`Stim-B`
#> A flowSet with 8 experiments.
#> 
#>   column names:
#>   FSC-A FSC-H FSC-W SSC-A SSC-H SSC-W Alexa Fluor 488-A PE-A PE-Texas Red-A 7-AAD-A PE-Cy7-A Alexa Fluor 405-A Alexa Fluor 430-A Qdot 605-A Alexa Fluor 647-A Alexa Fluor 700-A APC-Cy7-A Time
#> 
#> $`Stim-C`
#> A flowSet with 8 experiments.
#> 
#>   column names:
#>   FSC-A FSC-H FSC-W SSC-A SSC-H SSC-W Alexa Fluor 488-A PE-A PE-Texas Red-A 7-AAD-A PE-Cy7-A Alexa Fluor 405-A Alexa Fluor 430-A Qdot 605-A Alexa Fluor 647-A Alexa Fluor 700-A APC-Cy7-A Time
#> 
#> $`Stim-D`
#> A flowSet with 8 experiments.
#> 
#>   column names:
#>   FSC-A FSC-H FSC-W SSC-A SSC-H SSC-W Alexa Fluor 488-A PE-A PE-Texas Red-A 7-AAD-A PE-Cy7-A Alexa Fluor 405-A Alexa Fluor 430-A Qdot 605-A Alexa Fluor 647-A Alexa Fluor 700-A APC-Cy7-A Time
#> 
#> $`NA`
#> A flowSet with 1 experiments.
#> 
#>   column names:
#>   FSC-A FSC-H FSC-W SSC-A SSC-H SSC-W Alexa Fluor 488-A PE-A PE-Texas Red-A 7-AAD-A PE-Cy7-A Alexa Fluor 405-A Alexa Fluor 430-A Qdot 605-A Alexa Fluor 647-A Alexa Fluor 700-A APC-Cy7-A Time
#> 

# Group GatingSet by Treatment and OVAConc
gs <- GatingSet(Activation)
cyto_group_by(gs, c("Treatment", "OVAConc"))
#> $`NA 0`
#> A GatingSet with 1 samples
#> 
#> $`Stim-A 0`
#> A GatingSet with 2 samples
#> 
#> $`Stim-A 5`
#> A GatingSet with 2 samples
#>

#>

#> A GatingSet with 2 samples
#> 
#> $`Stim-B 0`
#> A GatingSet with 2 samples
#> 
#> $`Stim-B 5`
#> A GatingSet with 2 samples
#> 
#> $`Stim-B 50`
#> A GatingSet with 2 samples
#> 
#> $`Stim-B 500`
#> A GatingSet with 2 samples
#> 
#> $`Stim-C 0`
#> A GatingSet with 2 samples
#> 
#> $`Stim-C 5`
#> A GatingSet with 2 samples
#> 
#> $`Stim-C 50`
#> A GatingSet with 2 samples
#> 
#> $`Stim-C 500`
#> A GatingSet with 2 samples
#> 
#> $`Stim-D 0`
#> A GatingSet with 2 samples
#> 
#> $`Stim-D 5`
#> A GatingSet with 2 samples
#> 
#> $`Stim-D 50`
